definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: How about because Jews don't torture and behead us as well as each other, idiot.
sentences.chinese: 是因为犹太人不会和我们彼此之间折磨和斩首，傻瓜。

sentences.english: If he failed, Palpatine threatened to behead the Grand Admiral.
sentences.chinese: 如果他失败，帕尔帕丁威胁要对这位元帅处以斩首。

sentences.english: His bloody throat had been cut so deeply that he was nearly decapitated.
sentences.chinese: 他的喉咙血淋淋的，刀口很深，几乎都要被斩首了。

sentences.english: Official video of the hanging shows Barzan being beheaded by the noose.
sentences.chinese: 官方录像显示被绞索斩首。

sentences.english: John the Baptist was faithful, but he was beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 施洗约翰也尽忠，下场却是被斩首。

sentences.english: I think that beheading in the market is not a proper policy.
sentences.chinese: 斩首示众这件事，我认为是很有问题的。

sentences.english: The day there was an execution held in the market – a criminal was beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 这一天在市集上，有罪犯被斩首示众。

sentences.english: We applaud the decapitations, and read Vogue too.
sentences.chinese: 我们为斩首而喝彩，也读《时尚》杂志。

sentences.english: Henry VIII gave the order to behead Anne Boleyn.
sentences.chinese: 亨利八世下令将安波林斩首。

sentences.english: After left the market, beheading in front of the mass still lingered on Laotse's mind.
sentences.chinese: 离开市集后，斩首示众这一幕仍然停留在老子的心中。

sentences.english: Sichuan wild bush orders will Ye Lingqing beheaded early tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 川野希子下达命令将叶凌青明天一早斩首。

sentences.english: Captives who fell into the hands of the Amazons were often decapitated.
sentences.chinese: 落入亚马逊人之手的战俘通常会被斩首。

sentences.english: Then in 1536, the king had Anne beheaded on a charge of adultery.
sentences.chinese: 而后1536年，亨利以通奸罪将安妮斩首。

sentences.english: They’re also continuing their pioneering research into flying decapitated fruit flies.
sentences.chinese: 他们还继续进行果蝇斩首的开创性研究。

sentences.english: He ordered to behead the two leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他下令将两个队长斩首。
斩首和断肢行为极为普遍。

definition: to behead sb and display the head in public
an execution/to put sb to death
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
